ad_format_asset.description: The format of the ad asset used in the campaign.

age.description: The age group targeted by the ad campaign.

app_id.description: The identifier for the mobile app associated with the ad.

body_asset_id.description: The ID of the main content or message of the ad.

body_asset.description: The main content or message of the ad.

call_to_action_asset_id.description: The ID of the specific action encouraged by the ad.

call_to_action_asset.description: The specific action encouraged by the ad.

country.description: The country where the ad is being displayed.

description_asset_id.description: The ID of additional descriptive text accompanying the ad content.

description_asset.description: Additional descriptive text accompanying the ad content.

device_platform.description: The device platform (e.g., mobile, desktop) targeted by the ad.

dma.description: Designated Market Area for ad targeting in the United States.

frequency_value.description: The number of times an ad was shown to a unique user.

gender.description: The gender targeted by the ad campaign.

hourly_stats_aggregated_by_advertiser_ti.description: Hourly statistical data aggregated based on the advertiser's time zone.

hourly_stats_aggregated_by_audience_time.description: Hourly statistical data aggregated based on the audience's time zone.

image_asset_id.description: The ID of the image asset used in the ad.

image_asset.description: The image asset used in the ad.

impression_device.description: The device type (e.g., smartphone, tablet) that generated the ad impression.

link_url_asset_id.description: The ID of the URL linked to by the ad.

link_url_asset.description: The URL linked to by the ad.

place_page_id.description: The identifier of the Facebook Page associated with the ad.

platform_position.description: The position where the ad appears on the platform (e.g., News Feed, right column).

product_id.description: The identifier of the product featured in the ad.

publisher_platform.description: The platform on which the ad is published (e.g., Facebook, Instagram).

region.description: The region being targeted by the ad campaign.

skan_conversion_id.description: The identifier used for measurement and attribution in the SkAdNetwork framework.

title_asset_id.description: The ID of the title or headline of the ad.

title_asset.description: The title or headline of the ad.

video_asset_id.description: The ID of the video asset used in the ad.

video_asset.description: The video asset used in the ad.
